title: for loop equivalent to while loop - write code

content.prompt: Which of the following code segments assigns the same value to  sum  as the preceding code segment?

choices.label:
int sum = 0;
for (int j = 0; j <= 5; j++)
{
   j++;
   sum += j;
}

int sum = 0;
for (int j = 0; j <= 6; j++)
{
   j++;
   sum += j;
}

int sum = 0;
for (int j = 1; j <= 5; j++)
{
   sum += j;
}

int sum = 0;
for (int j = 1; j <= 6; j++)
{
   sum += j;
}

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
